WorkItem.Description:
Hello,

It is not really an issue, and I apologize for that, but is it possible that you commit changes made for 1.7.9 to your github and packagist repos ?

By the way, Thanks for your work,
Damien

Comments.Message: Just in case, this is the package entry, in case ddeboer is not part of your project: https://packagist.org/packages/phpexcel/phpexcel
The official PHPExcel packagist entry is https://packagist.org/packages/phpoffice/phpexcel
The official github repo (as indicated in the ddeboer readme file) is https://github.com/PHPOffice/PHPExcel
